LanguageData.APT_RestartNote: NOTE: Game must be restarted to apply changes.
LanguageData.APT_OngoingEventWarning: WARNING: Changing settings while an event listed below is in progress may have adverse effects on your game. Do this at your own risk!
LanguageData.APT_EventSettingDesc: Enable or disable all changes for an event:
LanguageData.APT_RevTweakDesc: Revenant hypnosis effects change based on victims' psychic sensitivity.
LanguageData.APT_GoldCubeTweakDesc: Pawns become more or less susceptible to the Golden Cube based on their psychic sensitivity
LanguageData.APT_CorpseTweakDesc: Blocks the Unnatural Corpse from targeting psychically deaf pawns
LanguageData.APT_PainTweakDesc: Pawns become more or less susceptible to agony pulses based on their psychic sensitivity
LanguageData.APT_LevelNote: Enable or disable unique reactions for specific sensitivity ranges:
LanguageData.APT_EnableResistDesc: Enable or disable the ability to resist psychic anomalies based on psy sensitivity.
LanguageData.APT_EnableVulnDesc: Enable or disable additional vulnerability based on psy sensitivity
LanguageData.APT_EventModifiersDesc: Optional modifiers that change how vulnerabilities and resistances work
LanguageData.APT_EnableCorpseHeadCrush: Unnatural Corpse can crush psychically deaf pawns' heads
LanguageData.APT_EnableCorpseHeadCrushDesc: When enabled, the unnatural corpse will be able to target psychically deaf pawns, but it will crush their head instead of incinerating their brains. This takes slightly longer than normal psychic incineration.
